Description

Ethernet Status Register

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:2] - - - -
[1:0] speed r - csr.ethernet.status.speed[1:0]

Field Descriptions

speed - csr.ethernet.status.speed[1:0]

Indicates the established link speed on a particular Ethernet interface (0 - 10 Mbps, 1 - 100 Mbps, 2 - 1000 Mbps)
